src:
Rumunski parlament izglasao novu vladu, premijer Ludovik Orban

04 Nov 2019, 18:05


















Parlament Rumunije izglasao je danas novu, manjinsku vladu na čelu s premijerom Ludovikom Orbanom, čime je okončana politička kriza koja je uticala i na formiranje nove Evropske komisije.Za Orbanovu vladu centra glasalo je 240 poslanika, sedam više nego što je bilo potrebno.Orbanov kabinet će zameniti vladu Socijaldemokratske partije predvodjene Vijorikom Dančilom, kojoj je parlament 10. oktobra izglasao nepoverenje na zahtev opozicije.Predsednik Rumunije Klaus Joanis dodelio je potom mandat za formiranje vlade Orbanu, lideru Liberalne stranke.Nova vlada treba da predloži kandidata za evrokomesara za saobraćaj, pošto Rovana Plumb, koju je Rumunija prvobitno predložila za taj resor, nije dobila podršku Odbora za pravna pitanja Evropskog parlamenta, zbog čega je formiranje Evropske komisije odloženo za mesec dana.
text:
Romanian Parliament votes on new government, Prime Minister Ludovik Orban

04 Nov 2019, 17:05


















The Romanian parliament today voted for a new, minority government, headed by Prime Minister Ludovik Orban, ending the political crisis that also affected the formation of a new European Commission. will replace the government of the Social Democratic Party, led by Viorico Dancil, whose parliament voted no confidence on October 10 at the request of the opposition.Romanian President Klaus Ioannis then assigned a mandate to form the government of Orbán, the Liberal Party leader.The new government should nominate a candidate for EU commissioner for transport, since Rovana Plumb, originally proposed by Romania for the line, did not receive the support of the Committee on Legal Affairs of the European Parliament, which delayed the formation of the European Commission by a month.
